abstract.para: The components of SPK Library are unit-tested within the CppUnit framework. CppUnit is the C++ port of the famous JUnit framework for unit testing. Test output is in XML or text format for automatic testing and GUI based for supervised tests.

sect1.title: Download and Unpack
sect1.para:
Go to SourceForge.net and search by "CppUnit" or go to CppUnit Homepage. Download cppunit-1.8.0 (ie. cppunit-1.8.0.tar.gz) into /tmp on your machine. Uncompress and unpack the tarball by typing the following in /tmp directory:
tar xvzf cppunit-1.8.0.tar.gz
It will extract files into a new subdirectory, cppunit-1.8.0.

listitem.para:
Change directory to /tmp/cppunit-1.8.0 by typing in:
cd cppunit-1.8.0

First, run "configure" in the directory to correct values for various system dependent variables used druing compilation. Type and run:
./configure

Now, run Make to build the libraries.
make
This builds

Finally, install the libraries and header files into /usr/local/lib and /usr/local/include (by default), respectively. This requires you to login as root.
su - cd /tmp/cppunit-1.8.0 make install
